Sentencas: Nickel was added to a substrate composed of porous Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 (YSZ) in order to minimize anode damage during redox cycling in segmented-in-series tubular solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with YSZ electrolytes.
Titulo: Evaluation of Porous Ni-YSZ Cermets With Ni Content of 0-30 Vol. % as Insulating Substrates for Segmented-in-Series Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this study, the electrical insulating and thermal properties of these materials were evaluated for their suitability as substrates in the tubular SOFCs.
Titulo: Evaluation of Porous Ni-YSZ Cermets With Ni Content of 0-30 Vol. % as Insulating Substrates for Segmented-in-Series Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
